about_the_game:
This thematically gothic DLC adds five new witch classes and other character options to the game. It also adds new content for all players!

THE LORE OF HAUNTINGS




Hauntings gives the witch additional XP after interactions with spirits and ghosts and adds several new narrative options. Its signature spell is Wicked Anne, which calls a powerful ghost to the battlefield. Unlike other summons, the ghost lingers until defeated -- but to cast the spell the young witch must use a significant amount of their own life force. With the new lore comes five new witch classes:

  • The Witch of the Cairn
  • The Witch of the Crossroads
  • The Witch of the Pale Blade
  • The Witch of the Urn
  • The Witch of the Yewtree

OTHER ADDITIONS




  • Four new answers for the Seven Questions part of character creation
  • A new side quest
  • New spells
  • New encounters
  • New Congress of Moths enemy type
  • New items
  • New achievements
